name: pagemaker-cms
description: Pagemaker CMS - 乐天店铺页面可视化编辑器

scripts.dev: pnpm dev:frontend & cd apps/backend && make dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend run build && cd apps/backend && make build
scripts.test: pnpm test:frontend && pnpm test:shared && cd apps/backend && make test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend run lint && cd apps/backend && make lint
scripts.format: pnpm --filter frontend run format && cd apps/backend && make format
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter frontend run clean && cd apps/backend && make clean

author: mkblbj
